articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Mozambican Ambassador
    Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Antonio Inacio Junior, Mozambican ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Jan. 17.
 Present there was Choe Su Hon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs.    
 After receiving credentials Kim Yong Nam had a conversation with the ambassador.
